You can find more information on the Public Notices page of our website. \*\*\*](https://cityofclifton.org/departments/economic-community-development/main-street/meeting-information/#)

![](https://cityofclifton.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2022/08/July-5-2022-6-Copy.jpg)

Clifton Main Street Advisory Board meetings are held on the fourth Monday of each month at 6:00 p.m. in Clifton Civic Center, 403 West 3rd Street.

The public is welcome and encouraged to attend. These meetings are held in accordance with the Texas Open Meetings Act. For more information, contact the Main Street Staff at 254.675.8337.

Gather with business and community partners to share ideas & encouragement in our favorite Main Street venues for Main Street Mixers such as Perk Up! and Game On!  Locations vary, and information can be found on the Community Calendar and Clifton Main Street’s Facebook page. These “No Host” events provide opportunities for networking and collaboration while enjoying the people and places that make Clifton a unique and inviting place to live and work.  For more information, call the Main Street Staff at 254.675.8337.
